text: aur unhonne usake atirikt anek poojy bana lie hain, jo kisee cheez kee utpatti nahin kar sakate aur ve svayan utpann kiye jaate hain aur na ve adhikaar rakhate hain apane lie kisee haani ka, na adhikaar rakhate hain kisee laabh ka, na adhikaar rakhate hain maran aur na jeevan aur na punah[1] jeevit karane ka
